emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Synthesis
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of generating entire codebases from high-level descriptions or requirements, reducing human coding to oversight and refinement.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential job displacement in software development, shift in education towards teaching AI interaction and oversight.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ease of use, integration with existing development environments, cost savings, and legal considerations regarding AI-generated code.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Secure Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: A blockchain system designed to be resistant to quantum computing attacks, ensuring long-term security for transactions and data.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increased trust in digital transactions, but potential for creating a divide between quantum-secure and non-secure systems.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory acceptance, integration with current financial systems, and the maturity of quantum computing technology.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural-Linked Virtual Reality
emerging_technologies.description: VR systems that can interface directly with human neural signals, providing an ultra-immersive experience without the need for physical VR gear.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ethical concerns about privacy and data security, potential health implications from neural interfacing.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological maturity, public acceptance of neural technology, and development of non-invasive methods.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Pair Programming
mainstream_technologies.description: Developers work alongside AI systems that offer real-time coding suggestions, debugging, and even code writing, transforming the development process.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech industries, with educational systems adapting curricula to teach AI-assisted coding.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Transport
mainstream_technologies.description: Self-driving vehicles and drones integrated into city transport systems, reducing traffic, accidents, and pollution.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Major cities have started implementing autonomous transport networks, with regulatory frameworks in place.

epoch_themes.description: AI technologies becoming ubiquitous in professional and personal life, enhancing productivity and decision-making.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shift in job markets, new roles for AI oversight, and increased efficiency in various sectors.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global push towards AI literacy, ethical AI development, and workforce reskilling programs.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on creating sustainable, self-sustaining urban environments using advanced technology.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Reduction in carbon footprints, improved quality of life, and new economic models based on sustainability.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased urban planning with tech integration, international cooperation on green technology, and smart city initiatives.
